name: SecurityGroupEgress
shortDesc: The AWS::EC2::SecurityGroupEgress resource adds an egress rule to an Amazon VPC security group.

properties.name: DestinationSecurityGroupId
properties.desc: Specifies the group ID of the destination Amazon VPC security group.

properties.name: FromPort
properties.desc: Start of port range for the TCP and UDP protocols, or an ICMP type number. If you specify icmp for the IpProtocol property, you can specify -1 as a wildcard (i.e., any ICMP type number).

properties.name: GroupId
properties.desc: ID of the Amazon VPC security group to modify. This value can be a reference to an AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup resource that has a valid VpcId property or the ID of an existing Amazon VPC security group.

properties.name: IpProtocol
properties.desc: IP protocol name or number. For valid values, see the IpProtocol parameter in AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress

properties.name: ToPort
properties.desc: End of port range for the TCP and UDP protocols, or an ICMP code. If you specify icmp for the IpProtocol property, you can specify -1 as a wildcard (i.e., any ICMP code).
